messages.subject: SSUDs Schedule Change
messages.msgSnippet: SSUDs (dads get-together), previously scheduled for Saturday morning at 9:00am, has been changed to Friday evening from 6:30-8:00pm.  Since I know  the
messages.messageBody:
SSUDs (dads' get-together), previously scheduled for Saturday morning at
9:00am, has been changed to Friday evening from 6:30-8:00pm. Since I know the
conference coordinator so well and she is such a cool person, we thought it
best to get this in earlier in the conference. If there are open questions
after our Friday evening meeting, we'll schedule another, more informal
discussion before the meeting's end.

Please note the change and let me know if you want something discussed
during the meeting.

Ben Lovejoy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
